item.title: Bitcoin's Diminishing Monthly Returns - A Decade Ahead
item.description:
Over the past 15 years, Bitcoin has repeated one of the most recognizable rhythms in modern finance - a 4-year cycle of expansion and retracement.
The structure has remained consistent: three years of bull market, followed by one year of correction.

This visualization explores what could happen if that rhythm continues, but with diminishing monthly returns as adoption and market maturity gradually slow the pace of growth.
